code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProductDetails(_ref){let{contract}=_ref;const[productId,setProductId]=useState(0);const[product,setProduct]=useState(null);const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const result=await contract.methods.listProduct(productId).call();setProduct({name:result[0],price:result[1],stock:result[2]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Product Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Product ID:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",value:productId,onChange:e=>setProductId(parseInt(e.target.value)),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Get Details"})]}),product&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Name: ",product.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Price: ",product.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Stock: ",product.stock]})]})]});}export default ProductDetails;
